net.openhft.collections

Interface SharedHashMap<K,V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, ConcurrentMap<K,V>, Map<K,V>

    public interface SharedHashMap<K,V>
extends ConcurrentMap<K,V>, Closeable

    • Method Detail

      • longSize

        long longSize()
        Returns:
        size as a long.
        See Also:
        size()

      • getUsing

        V getUsing(K key,
         V value)
        Get a value for a key if available. If the value is Byteable, it will be assigned to reference the value, instead of copying the data for zero copy access to the collection.
        Parameters:
        key - to lookup.
        value - to reuse if possible. If null, a new object will be created.
        Returns:
        value found or null if not.

      • acquireUsing

        V acquireUsing(K key,
             V value)
        Acquire a value for a key, creating if absent. If the value is Byteable, it will be assigned to reference the value, instead of copying the data.
        Parameters:
        key - to lookup.
        value - to reuse if possible. If null, a new object will be created.
        Returns:
        value created or found.

      • file

        File file()
        Returns:
        The file or directory for this SharedHashMap
